mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into member (member_name, member_password, email, phoneNumber, default_address, `level`, active) values (#{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defaultAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{active,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update member set member_name = #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_password = #{memberPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phoneNumber = #{phonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, default_address = #{defaultAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `level` = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, active = #{active,jdbcType=BIT} where member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select member_id, member_name, member_password, email, phoneNumber, default_address, `level`, active from member where member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select member_id, member_name, member_password, email, phoneNumber, default_address, `level`, active from member
